reservation_wait: Please wait for confirmation from the restaurant.
reservation_no_response: If you don't receive a response within 15 minutes, please call the restaurant.
order_wait: Please wait for confirmation from the restaurant for your order.
order_no_response: If you don't receive a response within 5 minutes, please call the restaurant.
reservation_description: Reserve your table at our restaurant and enjoy an unforgettable dining experience. We look forward to welcoming you!
delivery_notice: Delivery fees not included in total price
restaurant_closed_message: The restaurant is currently closed. Please try again during opening hours.
wa_confirm_order: Please confirm this order. Thank you! üôè
terms_acceptance_text: By using our website and services, you agree to comply with these terms of service.
terms_service_usage_text: Our website is designed for browsing our menu, placing orders via WhatsApp, and making reservations.
terms_orders_text: All orders are processed through WhatsApp. Reservations are subject to availability and confirmation.
terms_payment_text: Payment is handled directly at the restaurant. Online orders are for convenience and confirmation only.
terms_liability_text: We are not responsible for third-party services such as WhatsApp. Use of external services is subject to their terms.
terms_changes_text: We may update these terms from time to time. Continued use constitutes acceptance of revised terms.
privacy_info_collection_text: We respect your privacy. Our website does not use cookies or online tracking. Information is stored locally in your browser (LocalStorage) for continuity, and may include name and order preferences (personal/family).
privacy_info_usage_text: We only use information to provide our services and improve your experience. We do not share personal data with third parties.
privacy_cookies_text: Our website does not use cookies or tracking technologies. All data is stored locally in your browser.
privacy_whatsapp_text: Order placement occurs through WhatsApp (external service). WhatsApp usage is subject to WhatsApp's terms and privacy policy.
privacy_data_storage_text: Data is stored locally on your device and on WhatsApp for order processing and communication purposes.
privacy_user_rights_text: For any questions or requests regarding your data, please contact us through our contact page.
accessibility_commitment_text: We are committed to making our website accessible according to Israeli Standard TI 5568 based on WCAG 2.0 Level AA. Our goal is to provide an accessible, equal, and comfortable user experience for all users.
accessibility_standards_text: Our website follows modern accessibility guidelines including keyboard navigation, screen reader compatibility, and clear visual design.
accessibility_features_text: The website includes proper heading structure, alternative text for images, keyboard navigation support, and responsive design for various devices and assistive technologies.
accessibility_contact_text: If you encounter any accessibility issues or have suggestions for improvement, please contact us via phone or WhatsApp listed on our contact page.
name_required: Customer name is required before sending to WhatsApp
closed_popup_message: The restaurant is currently closed. Orders can be placed only during opening hours.
